//======================= About page: UPS has partnered up with Magento to offer a free UPS Shipping and UPS Access Point™ Module that will allow you to integrate and offer a wide range of UPS shipping & delivery solutions directly on your website check-out process! This official UPS Module for Magento gives your customers access to our expansive UPS Access Point network and delivery services.
//======================== O stranici: UPS se udružio s Magentom kako bi ponudio besplatnu UPS dostavu i UPS Access Point™ modul koji će vam omogućiti integraciju i ponudu širokog spektra UPS rješenja za otpremu i dostavu izravno u procesu odjave na vašoj web stranici! Ovaj službeni UPS modul za Magento daje vašim klijentima pristup našoj ekspanzivnoj UPS Access Point mreži i uslugama dostave.

//======================= About page: Simple & easy map interface for your customers to select UPS Access Point as per their preference.
//======================== O stranici: Jednostavno i jednostavno sučelje karte za vaše klijente da odaberu UPS pristupnu točku prema svojim željama.

//======================= About page: User-friendly interface for your customers to switch from Access Point delivery to home delivery.
//======================== O stranici: Sučelje prilagođeno korisnicima za prebacivanje s dostave putem pristupne točke na dostavu na kućnu adresu.

//======================= About page: Real time UPS shipping rate or flat rates for each available service (as per merchant’s back office settings).
//======================== O stranici: UPS cijena dostave u stvarnom vremenu ili paušalne stope za svaku dostupnu uslugu (prema postavkama pozadinskog ureda trgovca).

//======================= About page: Range of options to set up delivery rates that your customers will see (for example: free shipping, real time shipping rates, or flat rates as per basket value thresholds).
//======================== O stranici: Raspon opcija za postavljanje stopa isporuke koje će vaši kupci vidjeti (na primjer: besplatna dostava, stope dostave u stvarnom vremenu ili fiksne stope prema pragovima vrijednosti košarice).

//======================= About page: Possibility to open a UPS account directly in the module itself, if you do not have one.
//======================== O stranici: Mogućnost otvaranja UPS računa direktno u samom modulu, ukoliko ga nemate.
Informacije o praćenju u stvarnom vremenu.

//======================= About page: Ability to export open orders so that you can process them in other applications for more complex needs.
//======================== O stranici: Mogućnost izvoza otvorenih naloga kako biste ih mogli obraditi u drugim aplikacijama za složenije potrebe.

//======================= About page: Module version number and release date
//======================== O stranici: Broj verzije modula i datum izdavanja
Web stranica UPS modula za dostavu

Display all the Access Points in range of:

//======================== O stranici: Odaberite broj računa za ovu opciju
Isporuka na adresu primatelja (dostava na adresu)

//======================= About page: UPS delivers the parcel to the shipping address provided by customer.
//======================== O stranici: UPS dostavlja paket na adresu za dostavu koju je kupac naveo.

//======================= About page: The cut off time selected here will be used in calculating the schedule delivery date and time, which will be displayed on your website checkout.
//======================== O stranici: Vrijeme prekida koje je ovdje odabrano koristit će se u izračunu planiranog datuma i vremena isporuke, koji će biti prikazani na vašoj web-lokaciji.

//======================= About page: For example, if the cut off time is selected as 5 PM and your e-shoppers views your webstore at 5.01 PM, all UPS scheduled delivery dates and time will be calculated from the following business day. When deciding this cut off time, please ensure that you have sufficient time to fulfill the order before the UPS scheduled pick up or you are able to drop off the packages at a UPS Access Point™.
//======================== O stranici: Na primjer, ako je krajnje vrijeme odabrano kao 17:00, a vaši e-kupci pregledaju vašu web-trgovinu u 17:01, svi planirani datumi i vrijeme isporuke UPS-a računat će se od sljedećeg radnog dana. Prilikom odlučivanja o ovom vremenu prekida, pobrinite se da imate dovoljno vremena da ispunite narudžbu prije planiranog preuzimanja UPS-a ili da možete ostaviti pakete na lokaciji UPS Access Point™.

//======================= About page: If you are unsure about fulfilling customer orders on the same day, you can select 'Disable' which will result in the e-shopper seeing a generic delivery schedule for each available UPS service. For Example; 'UPS® Standard - In most cases, delivered within 1 to 3 business days in Europe.'
//======================== O stranici: Ako niste sigurni u ispunjavanje narudžbi kupaca istog dana, možete odabrati 'Onemogući' što će dovesti do toga da e-kupac vidi približne datume isporuke za svaku dostupnu uslugu.

//======================= About page: Please select at least one shipping service.
You have the official Magento COD module enabled!
//======================== O stranici: Omogućen vam je službeni Magento COD modul!

//======================= About page: Only show Access Points supporting COD shipments?
//======================== O stranici: Prikaži samo pristupne točke koje podržavaju COD pošiljke?

//======================= About page: Select 'YES' if you plan to offer COD shipments to a UPS Access Point™
//======================== O stranici: Odaberite 'DA' ako planirate ponuditi pošiljke COD-u UPS Access Point™

//======================= About page: The COD Shipping service of this plug-in is automatically compatible with the official Collect on Delivery (COD) module by Magento.
//======================== O stranici: Usluga dostave pouzećem ovog dodatka automatski je kompatibilna sa službenim Magentovim modulom preuzimanja pri isporuci (COD).

//======================= About page: You do not have the official Magento COD module installed and/or enabled!
//======================== O stranici: Nemate instaliran i/ili omogućen službeni Magento COD modul!

//======================= About page: The COD Shipping service of this plugin is automatically compatible with the official Cash on Delivery (COD) module by Magento.
//======================== O stranici: Usluga dostave pouzećem ovog dodatka automatski je kompatibilna sa službenim modulom plaćanja pouzećem (COD) tvrtke Magento.

//======================= About page: If you want the UPS Shipping module to automatically detect COD shipments, please make sure that you have installed Magento's Collect on Delivery (COD). If you already have Magento's Collect on Delivery (COD) module installed, please make sure that the module is enabled. [Click here] for detailed guidance.
//======================== O stranici: Ako želite da modul UPS Shipping automatski detektira pošiljke COD-om, molimo provjerite jeste li instalirali Magento's Collect on Delivery (COD). Ako već imate instaliran Magentov modul preuzimanja po isporuci (COD), provjerite je li modul omogućen. [Kliknite ovdje] za detaljne upute.

//======================= About page: Please enter weight and dimensions of your packaging here. You can add multiple package dimensions, which can be easily selected in a dropdown option when creating shipments in the plug-in.
//======================== O stranici: Ovdje unesite težinu i dimenzije svoje ambalaže. Možete dodati više dimenzija paketa, koje se lako mogu odabrati u padajućem izborniku prilikom kreiranja pošiljaka u dodatku.

//======================= About page: In case you decide to show the real time UPS shipping rate (to be configured in the next screen) to the e-shoppers, the plug-in will use the first package, referred to as the 'Default Package' that is displayed below. The Default Package's weight and dimensions will be used to calculate the UPS shipping rates that will be displayed to the e-shoppers.
//======================== O stranici: U slučaju da e-kupcima odlučite prikazati UPS stopu dostave u stvarnom vremenu (koja će se konfigurirati na sljedećem ekranu), dodatak će koristiti prvi paket, koji se naziva "zadani paket" koji je prikazan u nastavku. Težina i dimenzije zadanog paketa koristit će se za izračun UPS cijena dostave koje će biti prikazane e-kupcima.

//======================= About page: Example: Standard, Large, Phone box, etc.
//======================== O stranici: Primjer: Standard, Large, Phone box, itd.

//======================= About page: You are going to remove this default package from your profile. Click Ok to confirm, close the dialog to cancel.
//======================== O stranici: Uklonit ćete ovaj zadani paket sa svog profila. Kliknite U redu za potvrdu, zatvorite dijaloški okvir za odustajanje.

//======================= About page: Please input at least one default package to continue.
//======================== O stranici: Unesite barem jedan zadani paket za nastavak.

//======================= About page: Basic (number of items in the e-shopper order determine the package size)
//======================== O stranici: Osnovno (broj artikala u e-shopper narudžbi određuje veličinu paketa)

//======================= About page: Advanced (weights and dimensions of products in the e-shopper order determine the package size)
//======================== O stranici: Napredno (težine i dimenzije proizvoda u e-shopper narudžbi određuju veličinu paketa)

//======================= About page: Note: the plugin will create a custom package size if an e-shopper order is larger than the packages you enter
//======================== O stranici: Napomena: dodatak će stvoriti prilagođenu veličinu paketa ako je narudžba e-kupca veća od paketa koje unesete

//======================= About page: Warning! To use this option you must enter product weights in the product settings of your shop.
//======================== O stranici: Upozorenje! Za korištenje ove opcije morate unijeti težinu proizvoda u postavke proizvoda u vašoj trgovini.

//======================= About page: If set to “No”, rates will be based on product weights only.  If set to “Yes”, product dimensions must be entered in the product settings of your shop
//======================== O stranici: Ako je postavljeno na "Ne", cijene će se temeljiti samo na težini proizvoda.  Ako je postavljeno na "Da", dimenzije proizvoda moraju se unijeti u postavke proizvoda u vašoj trgovini

//======================= About page: Backup rate will only display to e-shoppers if there is an issue within product settings, such as weights missing or if weights/dimensions exceed UPS limits
//======================== O stranici: Rezervna stopa će se prikazati e-kupcima samo ako postoji problem unutar postavki proizvoda, kao što su nedostajuće težine ili ako težine/dimenzije premašuju UPS ograničenja

//======================= About page: Add default packages if you would like the package size used for rating to change based on the number of items in the e-shopper’s order
//======================== O stranici: Dodajte zadane pakete ako želite da se veličina paketa koja se koristi za ocjenjivanje mijenja na temelju broja artikala u narudžbi e-kupca

//======================= About page: Note: if the number of items in the e-shopper order do not match any of your entries, then the size of the package used for rating will be based on that of the highest item count exceeded by the e-shopper order.
//======================== O stranici: Napomena: ako broj artikala u narudžbi e-kupca ne odgovara nijednom od vaših unosa, tada će se veličina paketa koji se koristi za ocjenjivanje temeljiti na najvećem broju artikala premašenom narudžbom e-kupca.
//======================= Stranica s cijenama dostave uz plaćanje
Pošaljite na lokaciju UPS Access Point™

//======================= About page: The e-shopper will see the % of real time UPS rates. These rates are calculated using the default package weight and dimensions that you configured in the previous screen (Package Dimensions).
//======================== O stranici: E-kupac će vidjeti % UPS stopa u stvarnom vremenu. Te se cijene izračunavaju pomoću zadane težine i dimenzija paketa koje ste konfigurirali na prethodnom zaslonu (Dimenzije paketa).

//======================= About page: The minimum thresholds can not be the same.
//======================== O stranici: Minimalni pragovi ne mogu biti isti.

//======================= About page: Click on the 'Complete Configuration' button to finish the configuration of the plug-in and start offering UPS shipping services on your website.
//======================== O stranici: Kliknite na gumb 'Potpuna konfiguracija' kako biste dovršili konfiguraciju dodatka i počeli nuditi UPS usluge dostave na svojoj web stranici.

//======================= About page: If you are new to UPS, please refer to the following FAQs for additional information:
//======================== O stranici: Ako ste novi u UPS-u, dodatne informacije potražite u sljedećim često postavljanim pitanjima:

//======================= About page:
1) How do I get more information about my new UPS shipping account?
If you opened a new UPS shipping account from the plug-in, a confirmation email with more information will be sent to the email address that you entered while creating the new account.
//======================== O stranici:
1) Kako mogu dobiti više informacija o svom novom UPS računu za dostavu?
Ako ste otvorili novi UPS račun za dostavu iz dodatka, potvrdna e-poruka s više informacija bit će poslana na adresu e-pošte koju ste unijeli dok stvaranje novog računa.

//======================= About page:
2) How do I prepare my packages for UPS collection or drop off to a UPS Access Point™?
Refer to the package preparation recommendations at this link - https://www.ups.com/%1/%2/services/individual-shipper/preparing-to-ship.page
//======================== O stranici:
2. Kako mogu pripremiti svoje pakete za preuzimanje UPS-a ili ih ostaviti do lokacije UPS Access Point™?
Pogledajte preporuke za pripremu paketa na ovoj poveznici - https://www.ups.com/%1/%2/services/individual-shipper/preparing -to-ship.page

//======================= About page:
3) How do I give my packages to UPS?
You can drop you packages at any authorized UPS location such as a UPS Access Point™. Click below to search for a convenient access point location near you.
//======================== O stranici:
3. Kako mogu predati svoje pakete UPS-u?
Možete predati svoj paket na bilo kojoj ovlaštenoj UPS lokaciji kao što je UPS Access Point™ lokacija. Kliknite ispod kako biste potražili prikladnu lokaciju u vašoj blizini

//======================= About page: You can also ask UPS to pickup packages from your warehouse or business address. If you need an occasional pickup, you can directly schedule a pickup from UPS.COM using this link - https://wwwapps.ups.com/pickup/schedule?loc=%1
//======================== O stranici: Također možete zatražiti od UPS-a da preuzme pakete iz vašeg skladišta ili poslovne adrese. Ako trebate povremeno preuzimanje, možete izravno zakazati preuzimanje s UPS.COM pomoću ove veze - https://wwwapps.ups.com/pickup/schedule?loc=%1

//======================= About page: If you have UPS packages on most business days and would prefer a regular UPS pickup, you can email a completed and signed Pickup form to the following email address - konto@ups.com. Then a UPS representative will be in touch with you to discuss a daily UPS pickup.
//======================== O stranici: Ako imate UPS pakete većinom radnih dana i radije biste dobili redovno UPS preuzimanje, možete kontaktirati UPS pozivom na telefonski broj naveden pod Pitanja o naplati ovdje. Tada će predstavnik UPS-a stupiti u kontakt s vama kako bi razgovarali o dnevnom preuzimanju UPS-a.

//======================= About page: If you have UPS packages on most business days and would prefer a regular UPS pickup, you can contact UPS by calling at the phone number provided under Billing Questions here. Then a UPS representative will be in touch with you to discuss a daily UPS pickup.
//======================== O stranici: Ako većinu radnih dana imate UPS pakete i preferirate redovno preuzimanje UPS-om, pogledajte ovu poveznicu za upute o zakazivanju dnevnih preuzimanja: https://www.ups.com/us/en/shipping/services/value-added/daily-pickup.page

//======================= About page:
4. What steps do I need to take to set up a UPS Collect on Delivery (COD) service?
You can contact UPS by calling at the phone number provided under Billing Questions here. Then a UPS representative will be in touch with you to discuss the COD service.
//======================== O stranici:
4. Koje korake trebam poduzeti da postavim UPS uslugu preuzimanja pri isporuci (COD)?
UPS možete kontaktirati pozivom na telefonski broj naveden pod Pitanja o naplati ovdje. Zatim će predstavnik UPS-a kontaktirati s vama kako bi razgovarali o COD usluzi.

//======================= About page:
4) What steps do I need to take to set up a UPS Collect on Delivery (COD) service?
You can email a completed and signed COD form to the following email address - konto@ups.com. Then a UPS representative will be in touch with you to discuss the COD service.
//======================== O stranici:
4. Koje korake trebam poduzeti da postavim UPS uslugu preuzimanja pri isporuci (COD)?
Ako ste zainteresirani za korištenje usluga UPS preuzimanja pri isporuci (COD), pogledajte ovu vezu za detalje: < a href='https://www.ups.com/%1/%2/shipping/services/value-added/cod.page' target='_blank'>https://www.ups.com/%1 /%2/shipping/services/value-added/cod.page

Bez ograničenja, niste ovlašteni učiniti informacije dostupnima na bilo kojoj web stranici ili na drugi način reproducirati, distribuirati, kopirati, pohranjivati, koristiti ili prodavati informacije za komercijalnu dobit bez izričitog pisanog pristanka UPS-a. //======================= About page: If you are new to UPS, please refer to the following FAQs for additional information:

//======================= About page: By installing UPS Plugin you gained this convenient option to apply UPS recommended Security Enhancements to your e-shop.By enabling particular security enhancements below you can make your e-shop less vulnerable to some common hackers' attacks.

Note, you can keep UPS recommended Security Enhancements disabled if you have already implemented these security measures in other way (by tweaking your web servers configurations properly, by coding own Magento hooks or by using some other plugin that aims to implement the similar enhancements).
//======================== O stranici: Instaliranjem UPS dodatka dobili ste ovu praktičnu opciju za primjenu preporučenih sigurnosnih poboljšanja UPS-a na vašu e-trgovinu. Omogućavanjem određenih sigurnosnih poboljšanja u nastavku svoju e-trgovinu možete učiniti manje ranjivom na neke uobičajene hakerske napade.

//======================= About page: Note, you can keep UPS recommended Security Enhancements disabled if you have already implemented these security measures in other way (by tweaking your web servers configurations properly, by coding own Magento hooks or by using some other plugin that aims to implement the similar enhancements).

See [wikipedia|https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clickjacking] for more details. If you enable this defense, then UPS plugin will secure your store by communicating framing policy to user's browser through 'X-Frame-Options: Sameorigin' HTTP response header and by injecting 'frame-breaker' java script for legacy browsers.- UPS Plugin can secure your e-shop Front Office pages in accordance with OWASP recommended Clickjacking Defense Cheat Sheet Disable this defense if you wish to enable framing of your e-shop GUI on 3rd party websites; or if you have already implemented this defense differently.
//======================== O stranici: Pogledajte [wikipedia|https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clickjacking] za više detalja. Ako omogućite ovu obranu, tada će UPS dodatak osigurati vašu trgovinu komuniciranjem pravila uokvirivanja korisničkom pregledniku putem 'X-Frame-Options: Sameorigin' zaglavlja HTTP odgovora i ubacivanjem 'frame-breaker' java skripte za naslijeđene preglednike.- UPS dodatak može osigurati stranice Front Officea vaše e-trgovine u skladu s preporukom OWASP-a Varalica za obranu od Clickjackinga Onemogućite ovu obranu ako želite omogućiti uokvirivanje GUI-ja vaše e-trgovine na web stranicama trećih strana; ili ako ste ovu obranu već proveli drugačije.

//======================= About page:
See wikipedia for more details.If you check this option, UPS plugin will secure your e-shop Front Office by applying
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
//======================== O stranici:
Pogledajte wikipediju za više detalja. Ako označite ovu opciju, UPS dodatak će osigurati vaš Front Office vaše e-trgovine primjenom
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff

//======================= About page: HTTP Response Header to all Magento Front Office pages. That will prevent the client's browser (notably Internet Explorer) from MIME-sniffing a response away from the declared content-type. You may not really need this as your users are not supposed to upload any potentially harmful files to your e-shop (e.g. JavaScript instead of an Image). However, it is still good practice to enable this special security header as there is no performance penalty associated with it.
//======================== O stranici: Zaglavlje HTTP odgovora na sve stranice Magento Front Officea. To će spriječiti klijentov preglednik (posebno Internet Explorer) da MIME-njuškanjem odgovora odmakne od deklarirane vrste sadržaja. Ovo vam možda neće trebati jer vaši korisnici ne bi trebali učitavati potencijalno štetne datoteke u vašu e-trgovinu (npr. JavaScript umjesto slike). Međutim, i dalje je dobra praksa omogućiti ovo posebno sigurnosno zaglavlje budući da s njim nema kaznenih učinaka.

//======================= About page: Enables cross-site scripting filters in browsers that support the X-XSS-Protection directive
//======================== O stranici: Omogućuje filtre skriptiranja između web-mjesta u preglednicima koji podržavaju direktivu X-XSS-Protection

//======================= About page:
See wikipedia for more details.If you check this option, UPS plugin will secure your e-shop Front Office by applying
X-XSS-Protection: '1; mode=block'
HTTP response header to all Magento Front Office pages.
//======================== O stranici:
Pogledajte wikipediju za više detalja. Ako označite ovu opciju, UPS dodatak će zaštititi vaš Front Office vaše e-trgovine primjenom
X-XSS-Protection: '1; mode=block'
Zaglavlje HTTP odgovora na sve stranice Magento Front Officea.

//======================= About page: Protect your e-shop website against protocol downgrade attacks and cookie hijacking
//======================== O stranici: Zaštitite svoju web stranicu e-trgovine od napada na stariju verziju protokola i otmice kolačića

//======================= About page:
See wikipedia for more details If you check this option, UPS plugin will secure your e-shop Front Office by applying
Strict-Transport-Security 'max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains'
HTTP response header to all Magento Front Office pages.
//======================== O stranici:
Pogledajte wikipediju za više detalja. Ako označite ovu opciju, UPS dodatak će zaštititi vašu e-trgovinu Front Office primjenom
Strict-Transport-Security 'max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains'
HTTP zaglavlje odgovora na sve stranice Magento Front Officea.

//======================= About page: Prevent sensitive pages from caching by browser.
//======================== O stranici: Spriječite spremanje osjetljivih stranica u predmemoriju od strane preglednika.

//======================= About page:
See OWASP FAQs for more details. If you check this option, UPS plugin will secure the Checkout process by applying
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store
Expires: 0
Pragma: no-cache
HTTP response headers to the corresponding pages
//======================== O stranici:
Pogledajte OWASP FAQ za više detalja. Ako označite ovu opciju, UPS plugin će osigurati postupak naplate primjenom
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store
Istječe: 0
Pragma: no-cache
Zaglavlja HTTP odgovora na odgovarajuće stranice
